channel.title: Older Runescape Private Server (Normal Xp)
channel.description: I was looking around, and I thought. Why is there no Older RSPS with Normal Xp? Don't people miss playing the good old runescape? Before the Graphics messed it up? I Ask the Community. Would you play Good Old Runescape? With normal Xp Rates? A Normal Economy? For Free.

item.title: Older Runescape Private Server (Normal Xp)
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

Man all you kids on here posting are idiots get a VPS in the netherlands Jagex can’t do love all because there is NO COPYRIGHT LAW… no copy right law -= NO shutdown research the law before you throw false information…

They have a copyright law, it just isn’t as greatly enforced as in the US.

Read full topic

item.title: Older Runescape Private Server (Normal Xp)
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:16, topic:524127”][quote author=nickypie link=topic=642667.msg4327797#msg4327797 date=1373230330]

Oldschool RuneScape

Old School RuneScape - Play Old School RS

If you're a RuneScape veteran hungry for nostalgia, get stuck right in to Old School RuneScape. Sign up for membership and re-live the adventure.


[/quote]this ^ lol

It would be nice to see a server with a normal economy but I can’t say I have seen one yet since Final Judgement.[/quote]^ also after some more thought you should update poll questions some of us would like a good eco but not same rates and vise versa. I can’t really answer yes or no

Read full topic

item.title: Older Runescape Private Server (Normal Xp)
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:15, topic:524127”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=642667.msg4328095#msg4328095 date=1373293828]

You’re going to be spending more than $100/yr to keep the server running. As nice as it sounds to be free, there is no way to sustain a business model like that.

OSRS is well worth the money. You get a well developed server, a huge community, and no worry of Jagex shutting down the server for a long time.

I’m speaking specifically towards being a member of a server versus being a paying member for a company. I may not have money but I do what I can with voting and whatnot to help not be just another leaching member.
[/quote]
It was directed at him trying to be a server owner and offer everything for free. You cannot run a business with that model[/quote]
I was directly speaking to nicky, who was talking about playing a “server” with normal eco for $8/M

Read full topic

item.title: Older Runescape Private Server (Normal Xp)
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

Man all you kids on here posting are idiots get a VPS in the netherlands Jagex can’t do love all because there is NO COPYRIGHT LAW… no copy right law -= NO shutdown research the law before you throw false information…

Who told you this? the Netherlands do in fact have copyright laws

en.wikipedia.org

Copyright law of the Netherlands

According to the Dutch Copyright Law (called Auteurswet), a Dutch copyright (called auteursrecht) is the exclusive right of the author of a work of literature, science or art, to publish and duplicate such work (article 1). A copyright comes into existence by making the work. No formalities, such as copyright registration, are necessary to obtain a copyright. The duration of a copyright is 70 years after the death of the author (article 37). The term "work" includes many materials, such as books,...

jason246111:

I was looking around, and I thought. Why is there no Older RSPS with Normal Xp? Don’t people miss playing the good old runescape? Before the Graphics messed it up? I Ask the Community. Would you play Good Old Runescape? With normal Xp Rates? A Normal Economy? For Free.

The only server that comes to mind for what you’re looking for is Emps-Scape, but sadly they just shut down a little while ago. One of the oldest private servers.

Read full topic

You’re going to be spending more than $100/yr to keep the server running. As nice as it sounds to be free, there is no way to sustain a business model like that.

item.title: Older Runescape Private Server (Normal Xp)
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

This is an odd thread. Most people who want to play the game because they enjoy it are willing to pay money because it’s good… If they aren’t willing to pay for it, it mustn’t be good. If they can’t afford it then that’s another story.
If you are looking for one to play, don’t; you may as well bot-ridden osrs.

Read full topic

item.title: Older Runescape Private Server (Normal Xp)
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

nickypie:

yeah well host a free one and see how long it goes/how successfull before it shuts down. Your idea isnt original, ever heard of 2006scape? got shut down. Try the same thing and see what happens. Id rather pay 8 bucks a month for a 100% done server with over 5k players than a risky server with many bugs and few people.

A lot of people have gone to the RSPS community in search of a system that is decent and doesn’t cost ~100 USD a year. Some people don’t have money to just blow out their asses. I know I sure as hell don’t.

Read full topic
